neutron_diagnostic.documentation: Neutron diagnostic such as DNFM, NFM or MFC

neutron_diagnostic.characteristics.documentation: Description of Diagnostic's module detection characteristics for differen plasma modes based on Design Description

neutron_diagnostic.characteristics.dead_.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "dead_time"

neutron_diagnostic.characteristics.pulse.documentation: Lower counting limit of recent Measuring Mode and plasma reaction
Index in the error_description list for "pulse_length"

neutron_diagnostic.characteristics.react.documentation: Diagnostic's relative uncertainty for recent plasma reaction
Index in the error_description list for "error"
Characteristics of counting linear limits in recent Measuring modes for recent Plasma reaction type
Maximum count limit of recent Measuring Mode and plasma reaction
Index in the error_description list for "count_limit_max"
Minimum count limit of recent Measuring Mode and plasma reaction
Index in the error_description list for "count_limit_min"
Pulse probability overlap for recent plasma reaction
Index in the error_description list for "probability_overlap"

neutron_diagnostic.code.documentation: Generic decription of the code-specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

neutron_diagnostic.code.output_flag.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

neutron_diagnostic.code.parameters.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

neutron_diagnostic.detectors.documentation: Description of Detectors properties and Data in Neutron Diagnostic Module

neutron_diagnostic.detectors[:].adc.bias.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "bias"

neutron_diagnostic.detectors[:].adc.impe.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "impedance"

neutron_diagnostic.detectors[:].adc.inpu.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "input_range"

neutron_diagnostic.detectors[:].adc.samp.documentation: Number of samples recorded per second

neutron_diagnostic.detectors[:].amplitud.documentation: Processed peak amplitude of the measured signal
Processed peak amplitude of the measured signal
Index in the error_description list for "data"
Raw amplitude of the measured signal
Raw amplitude of the measured signal
Index in the error_description list for "data"

neutron_diagnostic.detectors[:].aperture.documentation: Description of a set of collimating apertures

If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the center of the circle. If geometry_type=1, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.
Index in the error_description list for "phi"
Index in the error_description list for "r"
Index in the error_description list for "z"

Type of geometry used to describe the surface of the detector or aperture (1:'outline', 2:'circular'). In case of 'outline', the surface is described by an outline of point in a local coordinate system defined by a centre and three unit vectors X1, X2, X3. In case of 'circular', the surface is a circle defined by its centre, radius, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3.
Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system
Index in the error_description list for "x1"
Index in the error_description list for "x2"
Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type = 2
Index in the error_description list for "radius"

Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is horizontal and oriented is the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when seen from above).
Index in the error_description list for "x"
Index in the error_description list for "y"
Index in the error_description list for "z"

Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.
Index in the error_description list for "x"
Index in the error_description list for "y"
Index in the error_description list for "z"

Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.
Index in the error_description list for "x"
Index in the error_description list for "y"
Index in the error_description list for "z"

neutron_diagnostic.ids_properties.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

neutron_diagnostic.ids_properties.commen.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

neutron_diagnostic.ids_properties.creati.documentation: Date at which this data has been produced

neutron_diagnostic.ids_properties.homoge.documentation: 1 if the time of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the time values for this IDS are stored in ../time just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree.

neutron_diagnostic.ids_properties.provid.documentation: Name of the person in charge of producing this data

neutron_diagnostic.ids_properties.source.documentation: Source of the data (any comment describing the origin of the data : code, path to diagnostic signals, processing method, ...)

neutron_diagnostic.unit_source[:].radiat.documentation: Radiation type on detector's converter (1 - 'neutrons'; 2 - 'gamma-rays')
Index of radiation type. TO BE REMOVED, since it is given by the index of the radiation array above.
Plasma reaction (1 - 'DT'; 2 - 'DD')
Second deriviation of Radiation flux from Unit Ring Source in recent detector's converter for "spline" reconstruction(1 - Number of Detector, 2 - Energy of particles)

Upper error for "d2flux_drdz"

Index in the error_description list for "energy"

Upper error for "energy"
Radiation flux from Unit Ring Source in recent detector's converter (1 - Number of Detector, 2 - Energy of particles)
Index in the error_description list for "flux"
Lower error for "flux"
Upper error for "flux"
Index of plasma reaction type. To be removed, since it is given by the index of the reaction array above.

Index in the error_description list for "reaction_rate"
Lower error for "reaction_rate"
Upper error for "reaction_rate"
